post: If it was created in the 13 hundreds I think a painting would be a best fit, but I have a lot of problems with this. OK, the paint falls off, and I may buy that it lease an outline, but how in the world could it leave a detailed image? If the paint falls off it would take any paint that was used to paint the details with it, assume the base somehow stayed. I don’t get it. Anyway have you tested this idea? Are you a painter? If you are you could paint a detailed image, age it and flex it for the paint to fall off and see what you get..
